duties_responsibilities.duty: Apply expertise in imagery analysis to support a 24/7 mission and solve geospatial intelligence problems.
Utilize remote sensing principles and methods to analyze data and solve geospatial intelligence tasking, collecting, processing, exploitation, and dissemination problems.
Demonstrate customer support expertise in addressing mission-critical client needs.

education_certification.credential: HS diploma or GED with TS/SCI clearance and polygraph
